snippet: It will be a great injustice if minimum-wage and overtime protections for home care workers are not approved by the Obama administration.
abstract: Editorial calls on Pres Obama to resist pressure from lobbyists and follow through on his push to guarantee minimum-wage and overtime-pay protections for home care workers; contends  group has been disenfranchised for nearly 40 years.
lead_paragraph: It will be a great injustice if minimum-wage and overtime protections for home care workers are not approved by the Obama administration.

headline.seo: Home Care Rules in the Home Stretch
headline.main: Home Care Rules in the Home Stretch
headline.print_headline: Home Care Rules in the Home Stretch
